name: Islander
description:
Help the agent to reach his fellow at the other end of the island as fast as possible.

How long did it take you to beat the game?
Feel free to share your result in the comments below!

Features:
- three different zones
- chiptune soundtrack made with love (and LMMS)
- a player character so cool that it doesn't need legs!

Controls:
AD : Move
W : Jump
Space : Dash
R : Reload Checkpoint (when dead)
W : Fly up (when in rocket mode)
